actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 8336 (c), United States Code so that Federal Mine Inspectors will be eligible for hazardous duty retirement annuities.

summary.text: Provides that employees separated from Government service after age 50, who have completed 20 years of service as law enforcement officials, firefighters, or mine inspectors (or any combination of such service totaling at least 20 years) are entitled to an annuity. Deletes the condition that the head of the agency recommend retirement and that the Civil Service Commission approve that recommendation. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8336(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8336 (c), United States Code so that Federal Mine Inspectors will be eligible for hazardous duty retirement annuities.
